Underworld [Underworld] 2003
For centuries vampires and werewolves caught a deadly duel, away from the eyes of humanity. In the midst of this struggle Selene (Kate Beckinsale), a vampire warrior, uncovers a plot to kidnap Michael (Scott Speedman), a young human doctor who is key in terms of werewolves to create a new breed that unites the qualities of vampires and werewolves and eliminate their weaknesses.

Underworld: Evolution [Underworld: Evolution] 2006
With the disclosure of secrets and determination of a betrayed Vampire warrior, a centuries-old battle between vampires and werewolves achieved a degree of further violence. The vampire Selene (Kate Beckinsale) is now looking for Marcus (Tony Curran), the king of vampires, intent on negotiating for his life. The hybrid Michael (Scott Speedman) wants to help Selene in his attempt, but she is unable to trust the werewolf fierce and uncontrolled that is inside your body and, therefore, refuses to help. However Selene is attacked by Marcus to find it. The intention is Marcus kill it, but she manages to escape and discovers that it was betrayed by his family. Determined to get revenge, Selene enlists the help of Adrian Tanis (Steven Mackintosh) to understand the web of lies that Marcus and Viktor (Bill Nighy) wove to conquer supremacy. Selena Tanis reveals the true identity of the first immortal Alexander Corvinus (Derek Jacobi), Marcus's father and also his twin brother, William (Brian Steele). Counting now with the help of Michael, Selene confronts Marcus, who wants to free his brother.

Underworld - Rise [Underworld: Rise of the Lycans] 2009
A bloody battle between two ancient explodes powerful and immortal tribes in Underworld - Rise (Underworld: Rise of the Lycans). The third film in the epic saga Underworld back in time to tell the origins of the conflict between the aristocratic vampires known as Death Dealers and the barbaric Lycans, a line of violent werewolves. With a higher dose of stunning images and amazing CGI creature effects than any of its predecessors, Underworld - Rise reveals one of the most dramatic secrets of successful film franchise.

Underworld: Awakening [Underworld: Awakening] 2012
In 'Underworld 4: Awakening', the vampire Selene (Kate Beckinsale) wakes up after being kept in a coma for twelve years, and discovers he has a daughter named Nissa. The girl is a dangerous mixture of the two races. When he finds his daughter, defends it needs a killer group of werewolves created by BioCom modified.
